patthana21.31:1.1: Nahetuṁ namaggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.31:2.1: Nahetuṁ namaggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.31:3.1: Nahetuṁ namaggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
